item.Q:

item.A:
shòu

jìn
最近 zuìjìn recent; recently; soon

traditional: 義
yì

item.Q:

to die; inpassable; uncrossable; inflexible; rigid
item.A:
sǐ
死亡 sǐwáng death; deadly

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: ordinary; plain; convenient; handy; easy; then; so; thus; to relieve oneself
2: advantageous; cheap
item.A:
1: biàn 2: pián
以便 yǐbiàn so that; so as to; in order to 便宜 piányi cheap; inexpensive

item.Q:

item.A:
to receive; to accept; to suffer; subjected to; to bear; to stand; pleasant; (passive marker)
受到 shòudào to receive; to suffer; obtained; given

item.Q:
Write the character: jìn
(zuìjìn de jìn)
item.A:
near; close (to); approximately
最近 zuìjìn recent; recently; soon

item.A:
traditional: 義
justice; righteousness; meaning

item.Q:

to die; inpassable; uncrossable; inflexible; rigid

item.Q:
Write the character: biàn
(yǐbiàn de biàn)
item.A:
ordinary; plain; convenient; handy; easy; then; so; thus; to relieve oneself
以便 yǐbiàn so that; so as to; in order to

item.Q:
Write the character: pián
(piányi de pián)
item.A:
advantageous; cheap
便宜 piányi cheap; inexpensive

item.Q:

(fǎnduì de fǎn)
item.A:
wrong side out or up; anti-
反对 (反對) fǎnduì to fight against; to oppose; to be opposed to; opposition
shòubùliǎo unbearable; unable to endure; can't stand
shòudào to receive; to suffer; obtained; given

shòuqì (to suffer) maltreatment; a bullied (person)
